query:
SELECT
            t.id,
            td.device_id as device,
            t.name,
            t.color
        FROM tag t
        JOIN tag_device td ON t.id = td.tag_id
        JOIN device d ON td.device_id = d.id
        WHERE
            CASE
                WHEN $1 ~ '^[0-9]+$' AND length($1) <= 10 THEN
                    d.id = $1::int4
                ELSE
                    d.serial_number = $1
            END
        ORDER BY t.id
